- This project uses React 19, TypeScript, Vite, React Router DOM, ESLint, and Prettier.
- Follow best practices for folder structure, code splitting, and accessibility.
- Use functional components and hooks.
- Prefer absolute imports from the `src` directory.
- Keep components small and focused.
- Use TypeScript for all code.
- Use Prettier for formatting and ESLint for linting.
